channel.title: Digital Forensics on Adventures of Spid3r
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Forensics on Adventures of Spid3r

item.title: CSTV - CAPTURE THE FLAG 2023 | Digital Forensics
item.description:
Nói thật thì đây là 1 giải khá khó chịu với mình, vì ngoài độ guessing của các thử thách (forensics, mobile) thì thật ra chẳng có gì để nói cả (và rất tiếc với 1 mình mình làm thì không thể giải quyết được toàn bộ cùng 1 lúc)

Lost Puppey

Description: This is my lost puppey. He is trying to hide himself and hide something from me. Can you find them for me?

item.title: UMDCTF 2023 | Digital Forensics
item.description:
Information

UMDCTF 2023 starts at 5:00 AM on April 29, 2023, and ends at 5:00 AM on May 1, 2023 (which is not at all suitable for someone like me who loves to sleep in). The challenges in this competition revolve around Pokemon.

Ranking

Our team ranked 17th/745 teams with 12,799 points. Detail of scoreboard here

It’s a bit disappointing that during the competition, I couldn’t fully solve the Forensics challenges. By around 5 AM, when the competition ended, I was too exhausted to continue thinking.
